feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • revert: "chore: Migration to backfill EventType.userId with B, if null" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20598
  • revert: "feat: enable 'Overlay Calendar' enabled by default for signeâ€¦ by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20600
  • chore: Add id column in CalendarCache by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20578
  • fix: Layout is not being set properly on mobile screens by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20584
  • fix: weight filter should never return length=0 by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20588
  • feat: sticky-shell in event-types by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20566
  • fix: use real ip in throttler [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20606
  • fix: Incorrect booker URL for individual event types inside the org by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20602
  • feat: restrict attributes tab to admin/owners only (CAL-4852) by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20603
  • feat: Salesforce - on booking cancel, write to event object by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20601
  • fix(CAL-5435): Conditionally render selection bar buttons based on user role by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20604
  • fix: A few flakes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.17...v5.1.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: use correct organizer info when admin accepts team booking requiring confirmation by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20612
  • fix: full page reload on routing forms by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20625
  • fix: separate Filter Segment implementation from DataTableProvider by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20587
  • feat: move workflow emails to smtp by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20293
  • chore: Add more Salesforce logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20639
  • feat: added rescheduled UI to Booking page and Booking Listing page by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.18...v5.1.19

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Admin unlocking user, also verify workflow steps by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20613
  • chore: Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20641
  • feat: auto turn on overlay calendar while loggedin by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20610
  • feat: Removed offset start times feature from UI by @avnish100 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20634
  • feat: display year for bookings in different years by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20647
  • chore: remove unnecessary tests and mock data by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20648
  • fix: flaky ooo e2e test by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.19...v5.1.20

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add organization routing forms endpoints [v2] by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20580
  • fix: updatedAt routing form response migration by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20660
  • fix: convert SVG avatar into PNG on save and serve by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20654
  • fix: Broken API docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20664
  • fix: ensure only top tip has focusable elements by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20661
  • chore: Add logging and try/catch blocks in handleCancelBooking by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20665
  • revert: "fix: Broken API docs (#20664)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20667
  • fix: App installation option at the team level by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20666
  • perf: make useLocale hook to use server-fetched i18n if in App router context by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20597
  • fix: location input value in custom event name by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20619
  • fix: replace hard-coded strings with translation keys for internationalization by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20672
  • feat: Org and Team ID on organisation and team pages by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20645
  • fix: Make event type title visible in mobile view by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20670
  • fix: dynamic text variable not populating on workflows by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20657
  • fix(analytics): Add cookie_flags to GA4 config for embedded contexts by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20627
  • feat(event-types): phase out offset start times feature for new event types [CAL-5450] by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20623
  • chore: clean up api v2 docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20668
  • fix: make settings sidebar accordion items keyboard accessible by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20663
  • feat: conditionally show contact us or report issue based on plan by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20629
  • feat: allow paid users to see report issue option by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20687
  • fix: add react fragment to layout.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.20...v5.1.21

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Revert "fix: Make event type title visible in mobile view ( by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20695
  • chore: Make app compatible with Fluid Compute by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19841
  • fix: recalculate date range from filter segments by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20633
  • fix: uneven toggle ui on availability page by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20701
  • fix: made text dependent on host's refund policy by conditionally rendering text. by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20572

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.21...v5.2.0
